Address.label: Address
Address.value: 3201 CARNEGIE AVENUE, CLEVELAND, Ohio, 44115-2634, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Athersys Inc is a biotechnology company. It is focused on developing novel and proprietary therapies in the areas where there is an unmet medical need, particularly in the regenerative medicine area. The firm's main product is Multistem cell therapy. Its current clinical development programs are focused on treating neurological conditions, cardiovascular disease, inflammatory and immune disorders and certain pulmonary conditions. Its revenue has been derived from corporate collaborations, license agreements, and government grants.

value.name: Daniel A. Camardo
value.title: Chief Executive Officer, Secretary, Director & CAO
